mapper.select: SELECT LS_NO FROM TB_LS_LOC_ELEC WHERE convert(date,GETDATE()) BETWEEN ELEC_BEGIN_DATE AND ELEC_END_DATE
SELECT ENERGY_METER FROM TB_LS_LOC_ELEC WHERE LS_NO = #{contractNo} AND convert(date,GETDATE()) BETWEEN ELEC_BEGIN_DATE AND ELEC_END_DATE

SELECT B.SITE_ID siteId, (SELECT SITE_NAME FROM TB_SITE_MAIN WHERE SITE_ID = B.SITE_ID) siteName FROM TB_LS_LOC_ELEC A, TB_LS_SITE B WHERE A.LS_NO = B.LS_NO AND A.LOCATION_ID = B.LOCATION_ID AND A.LS_NO = #{contractNo} AND A.ENERGY_METER = #{electricityMeterNbr} AND CONVERT(DATE,#{appDate}) BETWEEN A.ELEC_BEGIN_DATE AND A.ELEC_END_DATE

SELECT A.ELEC_MODE, A.CHRG_MODE, (SELECT NORMAL_PRICE FROM TB_LS_ELEC_RANGE WHERE A.CHRG_MODE BETWEEN BEGIN_RANGE AND END_RANGE AND GETDATE() BETWEEN EFF_DATE AND END_DATE) NORMAL_PRICE, (SELECT SPECIAL_PRICE FROM TB_LS_ELEC_RANGE WHERE A.CHRG_MODE BETWEEN BEGIN_RANGE AND END_RANGE AND GETDATE() BETWEEN EFF_DATE AND END_DATE) SPECIAL_PRICE FROM TB_LS_LOC_ELEC A WHERE A.LS_NO = #{contractNo} AND A.ENERGY_METER = #{electricityMeterNbr} AND GETDATE() BETWEEN A.ELEC_BEGIN_DATE AND A.ELEC_END_DATE

Select b.NAME as siteName, a.LS_NO as LS_NO, a.LS_VER as LS_VER, a.LOCATION_ID as LOCATION_ID, a.ENERGY_METER as ENERGY_METER, a.ELEC_BEGIN_DATE as ELEC_BEGIN_DATE, a.ELEC_END_DATE as ELEC_END_DATE, a.ELEC_MODE as ELEC_MODE, a.CHRG_MODE as CHRG_MODE, a.BEGIN_DEGREE as BEGIN_DEGREE, a.END_DEGREE as END_DEGREE, a.ELEC_PLEDGE as ELEC_PLEDGE, a.PLDG_PAY_DATE as PLDG_PAY_DATE, a.ELEC_CUST_NAME as ELEC_CUST_NAME, a.ELEC_ADDR as ELEC_ADDR, a.ELEC_ADDR_STD as ELEC_ADDR_STD, a.PENALTY_DAY as PENALTY_DAY, a.PENALTY_DESC as PENALTY_DESC, a.SIGN_AGREEMENT as SIGN_AGREEMENT, a.FORM_ID as FORM_ID, a.CR_USER as CR_USER, a.CR_TIME as CR_TIME, a.MD_USER as MD_USER, a.MD_TIME as MD_TIME, a.org_ENERGY_METER,a.pldg_IN from TB_LS_LOC_ELEC as a left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP as b on a.ELEC_MODE = b.CODE where a.LS_VER=(Select max(CONVERT(INT, LS_VER)) from TB_LS_LOC_ELEC where ls_no = #{lsNo} and LOCATION_ID = #{locId}) and b.TYPE = 'LS_ELEC_MODE' and a.ls_no = #{lsNo} and a.LOCATION_ID = #{locId}

Select b.NAME as siteName, a.LS_NO as LS_NO, a.LS_VER as LS_VER, a.LOCATION_ID as LOCATION_ID, a.ENERGY_METER as ENERGY_METER, a.ELEC_BEGIN_DATE as ELEC_BEGIN_DATE, a.ELEC_END_DATE as ELEC_END_DATE, a.ELEC_MODE as ELEC_MODE, a.CHRG_MODE as CHRG_MODE, a.BEGIN_DEGREE as BEGIN_DEGREE, a.END_DEGREE as END_DEGREE, a.ELEC_PLEDGE as ELEC_PLEDGE, a.PLDG_PAY_DATE as PLDG_PAY_DATE, a.ELEC_CUST_NAME as ELEC_CUST_NAME, a.ELEC_ADDR as ELEC_ADDR, a.ELEC_ADDR_STD as ELEC_ADDR_STD, a.PENALTY_DAY as PENALTY_DAY, a.PENALTY_DESC as PENALTY_DESC, a.SIGN_AGREEMENT as SIGN_AGREEMENT, a.FORM_ID as FORM_ID, a.CR_USER as CR_USER, a.CR_TIME as CR_TIME, a.MD_USER as MD_USER, a.MD_TIME as MD_TIME, a.ORG_ENERGY_METER,a.pldg_IN from TB_LS_LOC_ELEC_ADDED as a left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP as b on a.ELEC_MODE = b.CODE where a.app_seq = #{appSeq} and b.TYPE = 'LS_ELEC_MODE'
and a.LOCATION_ID = #{locId}
